name: Magic Shapes: RED Beats
description:
Avoid all the shapes as you move your ways through the pulsing music beats.

Magic Shapes is a bullet-hell, chaotic rhythm game. Surrounded by the red shapes, you will move the square swiftly and stylishly through all the obstacles.
With a simple control scheme and an adrenaline-pumping soundtrack, Magic Shapes will treat you with a party visual mesmerizing and ear satisfying experience that you’ll never forget.

Feature:
- Feel the Rhythm: Immerse yourself in the smoothest combination of music beats and visual effects in this truly unique gameplay.
- Handcrafted Levels & Music: With 12+ songs with handcrafted animation and effect to enhance your music experience.
- Easy to play, Fun to master: Everyone can understand the basic game mechanics. It's easy for anyone to pick up and play.
- A treat to your eyes and ears: An experience unlike any others is waiting for you.

So what are you waiting for? Put your earphones on, and let’s move to the beat with Magic Shapes: RED Beats
